div.p: This project allows to open and work with Maven projects in the Netbeans IDE. Mevenide currently supports NetBeans 4.1 and 5.0 dev.
Mevenide for the 4.1 version and 5.0 beta version contains these features .
You can download the 0.9 release. It was tested with Maven 1.0.2 and Netbeans IDE 4.1 final. (also 5.0beta)

Reasonable effort is made to have it always working with the latest development builds of Netbeans 5.0. Please note that the grammar module (editor completion for maven xml files) in 0.9 release zip will work with the 4.1 but to get it working with 4.0 you need the old 4.0 nbm . In case you are using 5.0 development builds or 5.0 q-builds, get the the 5.0 nbm .
To get the latest Netbeans builds, go to the download page
